name: TowerDefenseSimulator
description:
Use mouse wheel to change tile selection.

  • Blue - Goal
  • Red - Enemy Spawner
  • Orange - Defense Turret
  • Gray - Wall
  • White - Blank

Place tiles around the board using the left mouse button. Start simulation using the right mouse button. Place one blue goal tower and defend it with walls and turrets from the enemies. Enemies can break through walls but not turrets. You lose when the enemies destroy your goal tower.

Enemy AI is implemented using Djikstra's Algorithm and Decision Trees.
